column5: Hey Glen.... just finished watching Roland Martin w/ Walt fishing Lake Martin, Alabama.. Good 'Ole Rolly was teaching us all about drop fishing...(Drop Shotting it was) Anyhoo, Awesome looking country thar Bud....awesome SON.... Sorry about the SON....it was Roland tho...'Gotta love it SON"
.....going to run into the kitchen quick...for a cool one... the Musky Hunter is comming on next... Saric...love this show, pete
SON!!!  Lake Martin has a tremendous Spotted Bass fishery!
